title: The Johns Hopkins Studies in Romance Literatures and Languages

see-also.note: The Johns Hopkins Studies in Romance Literatures and Languages: Extra Volume

additional-note: The first issue renewal noted here is the first for which the series is specifically mentioned in the CCE renewal record. The renewal was filed under Books rather than under Periodicals. Before concluding other issues (earlier or later) are in the public domain, search for renewals for books under their distinctive titles.  We have not systematically done such searches for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Nat Bender for copyright research on this title.
